title: Drawing, "Tractor, Model 720, front and side screens, for John Deere", January 29, 1959
medium: Brush and black wash, green and yellow washes, green and black crayons, graphite on tracing tissue
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right: JR 1-29-59.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower center: FRONT & SIDE SCREENS / OF DULL FINISH STAINLESS; lower right: JD C14-1.
description: Detailed drawing of John Deere tractor with view of front and side screens.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Tractor, Model 720, front and side screens, for John Deere", January 29, 1959.
January 29, 1959. Brush and black wash, green and yellow washes, green and black crayons, graphite on tracing tissue. Gift of Henry Dreyfuss. 1972-88-380.
